mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qnaboard ( item_key, order_key, cust_id, board_title, board_rdate, board_content, board_img, board_option, board_update, board_re ) VALUES ( #{itemKey}, #{orderKey}, #{custId}, #{boardTitle}, now(), #{boardContent}, #{boardImg}, #{boardOption}, now(), "답변대기" )
mapper.update: UPDATE qnaboard SET board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_img = #{boardImg}, board_update = now() WHERE board_key = #{boardKey}
mapper.select: SELECT q.board_key, q.item_key, q.cust_id, q.board_title, q.board_content, q.board_rdate, q.board_re, a.adcomments_key, a.adcomments_content, a.admin_id, a.adcomments_rdate FROM qnaboard q LEFT JOIN admin_comments a ON q.board_key = a.board_key WHERE q.item_key = #{itemKey} AND q.board_re='답변있음' ORDER BY q.board_rdate DESC
SELECT * FROM qnaboard ORDER BY board_key DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT * FROM qnaboard WHERE
board_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
board_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
cust_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY board_key DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qnaboard WHERE
board_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
board_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
cust_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
